description:
A man named Mark Whiteside, who savagely beat his girlfriend, a mother of two, Jenna Harley, one of the kids is his aswell and attempted to literally gauge her eyes out so no other man would want her was only sentenced to 14 months in prison, and was out in  less than 7. What kind of drug was the judge smoking? 🤯🤯🤯🤯 Now that he has just been released Jenna has released her full story to Magazines like Fabulous in the hopes noone will ever have to go through what she did with him.

I am posting this because man like this don’t ever deserve to have another woman in their life ever again, how can you do this to the mother of your child. Also for anyone wondering no she didnt attack him he was a consistent abuser over a lengthy period of time according to her story. Disgraceful.😡😡😡😡😡 FOLLOW @thewatchmedia2020 FOR ALL THE LATEST IN CRIME,CULTURE & LEGAL NEWS ‼️
